system.description:
Note: To perform this journey activity, the party must be in a populated area such as a Country Shire, Open Roads, or Urban Township.

Adventurers can force others into handing over their coins with a successful Intimidation check, or pickpocket travelers with a successful Sleight of Hand check. This journey activity usually takes a week to complete.

journeyProperties.criticalFailure: A potential victim turns out to be a rival adventuring party of similar capabilities and a fight ensues.
journeyProperties.success: The adventurer gains 1d8 gold per week of travel. When this journey activity is done in fewer than 7 days, the adventurer instead gains half as much gold (minimum 1 gold).
journeyProperties.criticalSuccess: As a success, and the adventurer gains a magic item worth 100 gold or less. This benefit can only be gained once per region.
